text: Hello, is there a way to put an image as an inline module? i dont want to create an image with hs create and have 4 files js css, etc etc, just want to have an inline module that may make possible for the Copywritter to change the image in the design tools, is there a way to create that from here on the local side of the template?
You could use the image HubL tag - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/tags#image|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/tags#image>
that will allow the copywriter to change it later? wow you saved me a lot of time
Yes, it adds a field to the contents sidebar like it's a regular ol module.
Thanks bro, you know if i can put this inside an hmtl to stylize with taild wind?

You could use export_to_template_context and widget_data to access the field like a custom module field. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/export-to-template-context|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/export-to-template-context>
